languages.text: "Умеренность есть мудрость! А мудрость есть свойство подлинных владык. За ваше поистине императорское благоразумие, Звездное Сиятельство!" {n}Губернатор торжественно осушает кубок амасека.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Умеренность есть мудрость! А мудрость есть свойство подлинных владык. За ваше поистине императорское благоразумие, Ваш-Сиятельство!" {n}Губернатор торжественно осушает кубок амасека.{/n}

languages.text: "Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Умеренность есть мудрость! А мудрость есть свойство подлинных владык. За ваше поистине императорское благоразумие, Звездное Сиятельство!" {n}Губернатор торжественно осушает кубок амасека.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}The governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}
"Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}The governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}

"Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}The Governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}
"Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}
"Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}

languages.text: “节制就是智慧，而智慧是真正的统治者的标志。为您的审慎致敬，来自上界的大人！”{n}总督带着庄严的表情，将手中的艾玛赛克酒一饮而尽。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “节制就是智慧，而智慧是真正的统治者的标志。为您的审慎致敬，来自上界的大人！”{n}总督带着庄严的表情，将手中的艾玛赛克酒一饮而尽。{/n}

languages.text: «¡La moderación es sabiduría! Y la sabiduría es la marca de un verdadero soberano. ¡Celebro su regia e imperial mesura, Excelencia Celestial!». {n}El gobernador apura solemnemente un cáliz de amasec.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡La moderación es sabiduría! Y la sabiduría es la marca de un verdadero soberano. ¡Celebro su regia e imperial mesura, Excelencia Celestial!». {n}El gobernador apura solemnemente un cáliz de amasec.{/n}

languages.text: "Ölçülü olmak bilgeliktir, bilgelik de gerçek hükümdarlara layık bir vasıftır. En yüksek İmparatorluk sağduyunuzun şerefine Semavi Efendimiz!" {n}Vali, bir kadeh amaseki tek dikişte ciddiyetle içiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ölçülü olmak bilgeliktir, bilgelik de gerçek hükümdarlara layık bir vasıftır. En yüksek İmparatorluk sağduyunuzun şerefine Semavi Efendimiz!" {n}Vali, bir kadeh amaseki tek dikişte ciddiyetle içiyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「節度というのは知恵です！そして、節度が真の統治者の資質です。天の閣下、帝国の慎ましさに乾杯！」{n}総督は、アマセックのゴブレットを真面目に飲み干す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「節度というのは知恵です！そして、節度が真の統治者の資質です。天の閣下、帝国の慎ましさに乾杯！」{n}総督は、アマセックのゴブレットを真面目に飲み干す。{/n}

languages.text: « La modération est signe de sagesse ! Et la sagesse est l'apanage des grands souverains. À votre impériale prudence, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! » {n}Le gouverneur vide un gobelet d'amasec d'une seule gorgée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La modération est signe de sagesse ! Et la sagesse est l'apanage des grands souverains. À votre impériale prudence, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! » {n}Le gouverneur vide un gobelet d'amasec d'une seule gorgée.{/n}

languages.text: "Mäßigung ist Weisheit! Und Weisheit ist das Merkmal wahrer Anführer. Auf Eure imperiale Bedachtsamkeit, Eure himmlische Hoheit!" {n}Der Gouverneur leert feierlich einen Kelch Amasec.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Moderation is wisdom! And wisdom is the attribute of true sovereigns. To your most Imperial prudence, Your Celestial Highness!" {n}The governor solemnly drains a goblet of amasec.{/n}
